sqlMap.select:
select t.DICTTYPEID, t.DICTTYPENAME from EOS_DICT_TYPE t where t.DICTTYPEID like 'DEVICE_%'
t.DICTTYPENAME like '%'|| #dictTypeName# ||'%'
select t.DICTTYPEID, t.DICTID, t.DICTNAME from EOS_DICT_ENTRY t where t.DICTTYPEID = #dictTypeId:VARCHAR#
select t.DICTTYPEID, t.DICTTYPENAME from EOS_DICT_TYPE t where t.DICTTYPEID = #dictTypeId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update EOS_DICT_TYPE t set t.DICTTYPENAME = #dictTypeName:VARCHAR# where t.DICTTYPEID = #dictTypeId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select t.DICTTYPEID, t.DICTID, t.DICTNAME from EOS_DICT_ENTRY t where t.DICTTYPEID = #dictTypeId:VARCHAR# and t.DICTID = #dictId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into EOS_DICT_ENTRY(DICTTYPEID, DICTID, DICTNAME, STATUS, RANK, SEQNO) values (#dictTypeId:VARCHAR#, #dictId:VARCHAR#, #dictName:VARCHAR#, 1, 1, '.'|| #dictId:VARCHAR# ||'.')
sqlMap.update: update EOS_DICT_ENTRY t set DICTNAME = #dictName:VARCHAR# where t.DICTTYPEID = #dictTypeId:VARCHAR# and t.DICTID = #dictId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete: delete from EOS_DICT_ENTRY t where t.DICTTYPEID = #dictTypeId:VARCHAR# and t.DICTID = #dictId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select * from t_new_deviceManagement where 1=1
